title: "OpenAI Agents SDK - Intro"

# Installation 

- [Normal SDK Official Link](https://platform.openai.com/docs/quickstart){target="_blank"}
- [Agents SDK Official Link](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/agents-sdk){target="_blank"}


`TypeScript`
```bash
npm install openai # OpenAI SDK
npm install @openai/agents zod@3 # OpenAI Agents SDK
```

`Python`
```bash
pip install openai # OpenAI SDK
pip install openai-agents # OpenAI Agents SDK
```

`Environment Variables`
```bash
export OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-adfjlafaldgjhl # required

export OPENAI_BASE_URL=https://aipipe.org/openai/v1 # required only if api_key is from some proxy
# By default: https://api.openai.com/v1
```

<details open>
<summary><h2 style="display: inline;">1Ô∏è‚É£ Using **OpenAI SDK** (Normal SDK)</h2></summary>

</br>

**Note**: **Low level abstraction** so need to manage so much things.

```ts
import OpenAI from "openai";
const openai = new OpenAI();

const response = await openai.responses.create({
    model: "gpt-4.1",
    input: "Tell me a three sentence bedtime story about a unicorn."
});

console.log(response);

```

</details>

<details open>
<summary><h2 style="display: inline;">2Ô∏è‚É£ Using **OpenAI Agentic SDK** (Agentic SDK)</h2></summary>

</br>

**Note**: **High level abstraction** so easy to make highly complex applications.

```ts
import { Agent, run } from '@openai/agents';

const agent = new Agent({
  name: 'Assistant',
  instructions: 'You are a helpful assistant',
});



const result = await run(
  agent,
  'Write a haiku about recursion in programming.',
);
console.log(result.finalOutput);
```
 
</details>

---



### üìå Summary in one line

- ‚úÖ **OpenAI SDK** = Just talk to the model, Low level abstraction  
- ü§ñ **OpenAI Agent SDK / Framework** = Model + tools + memory + reasoning ‚Üí actual autonomous Agent, High level abstraction
